Posts.Content: Jun 20, 2013 03:34AM Seebha wrote: I am diagnosed recently. I am a mom of two sons 3 and 5. I was shattered when I hear this. All I can say is that try to stay positive for yourself and for ur kids too. See we have to cross this journey, so it's better to be +ve rather than bein -ve. I know it's easy to say but believe me it's not that too hard also, just look at ur kids and then think. And yes if u want to cry, then cry as much as u want as that also helps. Good luck
